about_the_game:
Dreadfire is a thrilling and visceral ultraviolent first-person shooter game. Vigorously annihilate your opponents with a robust toolset of assertive weapons. Leave no survivors!

AN ENTHRALING SINGLE-PLAYER CAMPAIGN


Stuck in a gigantic and dangerous facility against powerful clones controlled by 4 vengeful genetically modified test subjects. Fight against impossible odds and save the world from a threat greater than anything humanity's ever seen before.

BRUTAL COMBAT


Decimate your enemies with powerful tools of destruction. Charge through rooms filled with hazards as your guns spit out armies of bullets and watch as your enemies explode into nothing but blood and guts.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains frequent blood, gore, violence, profanity, themes of suicide, and disturbing imagery.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above.
  • Processor: Core i5 4570
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 (6GB)
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The bare minimum to run this game (30 FPS). The requirements will lower as the game gets more optimized.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10.
  • Processor: Core i5 7200U
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 or higher
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game is currently a bit on the heavy side. Requirements will lower as the game gets more optimized.

short_description: Dreadfire is a thrilling ultraviolent FPS game. Shred your enemies with a large destructive arsenal. Destroy them until none remain. They won't stop until you're dead.
